tutorial: Testing a Trading Idea - The Other Stages
type: Tutorial Step - Copy The Node's Path!

definition.text: Do you remember how to extract the address of the node so that we may reference it from our formula?

paragraphs.text: Open the node's menu and click on the Copy Node Path button!

The following string should end up in your clipboard:
tradingEngine.tradingCurrent.tradingEpisode.
episodeBaseAsset.balance.value
I introduced a line break so that the string fits the tutorial. Make sure the line is not broken in your formula as it would be an invalid path!
